document_name: Good Governance through Civil Cervice Reform III

outputs.output_descr:
Following are key outputs of the project:
1 Competitive recruitment examinations 
 organized by the Civil Service Commission
 and capacity of CSC staff enhanced
2. Capacity of the staff of CSC and HR and
 legal departments of the central and local
Government agencies, including ethic
 commissioners to  monitor and implement
 the  Law on Ethical Behaviour Rules of the
 Civil Servants rules is enhanced
3. Civil servants are trained on and have
clear understanding of performance 
appraisal system

project_descr: Good Governance through Civil Service Reform III
